Class NGOAids

java.lang.Object
NGOAids
public class NGOAids extends Object
This is the NGOAids class that contains all the methods to manipulate the aids received by an NGO.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NGOAids()
    Creates an NGOAids with aid and user set to null and quantity set to zero (0).
    NGOAids(String aid, int quantity, NGO user)
    Creates an NGOAids with the speicified aid, quantity, and user.

      Creates an NGOAids with aid and user set to null and quantity set to zero (0).

    • NGOAids

      public NGOAids(String aid, int quantity, NGO user)
      Creates an NGOAids with the speicified aid, quantity, and user.
      Parameters:
      aid - the content of aid
      quantity - the value of quantity
      user - the NGO user

  • Method Details

    • aidsReceivedCount

      public static int aidsReceivedCount(NGO user)
      Returns the amount of aids the current NGO logged in has received so far.
      Parameters:
      user - the user logged
      Returns:
      the amount of aids the current NGO has received

    • writeAidstoFile

      public void writeAidstoFile()
      Writes the NGOAids to the aidsNeeded.csv files. If the file is unable to be written to, the user will receive an error message.

    • getAidsList

      public static ArrayList<String> getAidsList(String filename)
      Retrieves every entry from a file containing all of the aids received/needed by all the NGOs.
      Parameters:
      filename - the specified filename the method will retrieve data from
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing of all the aids received/needed by NGOs

    • getFilteredAidsList

      public static ArrayList<String> getFilteredAidsList(NGO NGOFilter, String filename)
      Retrieves all the aids received or needed by a specified NGO from files containing the requested information
      Parameters:
      NGOFilter - user inputs the specific NGO who's aids they wish to view
      filename - the name of the file the method will read from
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of aids received/needed by the specified NGO

    • removeFromFile

      protected static void removeFromFile(NGO account)
      This remove's an NGO's aids needed data from the files.
      Parameters:
      account - the account whose aids data is to be removed.

    • toCSVString

      public String toCSVString()
      Returns the aid, quantity, the NGOName, and the NGO manpower
      Returns:
      a string of aid, quantity, the NGOName, and the NGO manpower in a suitable format for a CSV file

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns the content of aid, quantity, the NGOName, and the NGO manpower
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      returns a string of the content of aid, the value of quantity, the content of NGOName, and the value of manpower in an appropriate string format
